title: Handling Crazy Situations With Joy
itunes:author: Guest: Tricia Goyer
itunes:summary:
When your plans fall apart, it can be very overwhelming. But what if a moment gone awry with your kids actually turned into a fun and lasting memory? Danny and John offer a healthy perspective for responding well, even when your plans don't work out.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/parentingpodcast, or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

Get Tricia Goyer's book "The Grumble-Free Year" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofp-podcast-2021-07-22?refcd=1142304
